title: Bug 49299: Custom cookie name does not affect URL rewriting
description: The Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 states that a custom cookie name affects URL rewriting. However, the observed behavior contradicts this.
OB: The Reload link does not include the custom cookie name in the URL rewriting.
EB: The expected behavior is for the Reload link to include the custom cookie name in the URL rewriting.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Set a custom cookie name in the Servlet configuration.
2. Access the web application.
3. Notice that the Reload link does not include the custom cookie name in the URL rewriting.
